title: Pad Thai - Thailand's Most Famous Dish

caption.default: 🍜 Did you know Pad Thai was created in the 1930s as part of a campaign to promote Thai nationalism? This stir-fried noodle dish perfectly balances sweet, sour, and salty flavors!
caption.facebook:
🍜 PAD THAI - More than just noodles! 🇹🇭

Did you know Pad Thai was created in the 1930s as part of a campaign to promote Thai nationalism? This iconic dish perfectly balances sweet, sour, and salty flavors with tamarind, fish sauce, and palm sugar.

✨ Pro tip: The best Pad Thai in Bangkok can be found at street stalls, not fancy restaurants!
caption.instagram:
🍜 PAD THAI - Thailand's National Dish! 🇹🇭

Fun fact: This iconic stir-fry was invented in the 1930s! 🕰️

📍 Where to find the best:
• Thip Samai (Bangkok) - Since 1966
• Street vendors on Khao San Road
• Night markets across Thailand

💡 Local secret: Ask for 'Pad Thai Goong Sod' for fresh shrimp version!

imageAlt: Authentic Pad Thai with shrimp and peanuts

cta.text: 📖 Read our complete Pad Thai guide

title: Tom Yum Goong - The Perfect Thai Soup

caption.default: 🌶️ Tom Yum Goong: Thailand's legendary hot & sour soup! This aromatic masterpiece combines lemongrass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves, and fresh prawns in a spicy-sour broth that'll awaken all your senses!
caption.facebook:
🌶️ TOM YUM GOONG - Thailand's Soul in a Bowl! 🦐

This isn't just soup - it's an explosion of Thai flavors! The perfect balance of:
🔥 Spicy (from fresh chilies)
🍋 Sour (from lime juice)
🌿 Aromatic (lemongrass & galangal)

💡 Insider tip: Order 'Tom Yum Nam Khon' for the creamy version with coconut milk!
caption.instagram:
🌶️ TOM YUM GOONG 🦐

Thailand's most famous soup! 🇹🇭

✨ What makes it special:
• Fresh prawns 🦐
• Lemongrass 🌿
• Galangal root
• Kaffir lime leaves
• Thai chilies 🌶️

🔥 Spice level: HOT
💰 Price: 60-120 THB

imageAlt: Spicy Tom Yum Goong soup with prawns

title: Mango Sticky Rice - Thai Dessert Heaven

caption.default: 🥭 Khao Niao Mamuang (Mango Sticky Rice) - Thailand's most beloved dessert! Sweet ripe mango served with coconut-infused sticky rice and topped with crispy mung beans. Pure tropical bliss! 🌴
caption.facebook:
🥭 MANGO STICKY RICE - Thailand's Sweetest Treat! 🍚

Khao Niao Mamuang is the perfect ending to any Thai meal:
• Perfectly ripe Nam Dok Mai mangoes
• Coconut-infused sticky rice
• Crispy golden mung beans on top

📅 Best season: April-June (mango season)
💰 Price: 50-80 THB

🏆 Must-try spot: Mae Varee in Bangkok's Thonglor area!
caption.instagram:
🥭 MANGO STICKY RICE 🍚

Thailand's dessert perfection! 🇹🇭

📸 Instagram-worthy AND delicious!

🌟 Pro tips:
• Best during mango season (Apr-Jun)
• Try it with durian for adventure!
• Mae Varee (BKK) = #1 spot

⏰ Available all day, but best fresh!

caption.default: 🍛 Gaeng Keow Wan (Green Curry) - The perfect balance of spicy, sweet, and creamy! Made with fresh green chilies, Thai basil, and coconut milk. A must-try Thai classic! 🌶️
caption.facebook:
🍛 GREEN CURRY - Thailand's Aromatic Masterpiece! 🌿

Gaeng Keow Wan brings together:
• Fresh green chilies & Thai basil
• Creamy coconut milk
• Your choice of chicken, beef, or tofu
• Thai eggplant & bamboo shoots

🌶️ Spice level: Medium-Hot
💡 Local tip: Order with 'pet nit noi' (a little spicy) if you're heat-sensitive!

📍 Best enjoyed with jasmine rice to balance the heat!
caption.instagram:
🍛 GREEN CURRY LOVE 💚

Thailand's most aromatic curry! 🇹🇭

✨ What's inside:
• Green chilies 🌶️
• Thai basil 🌿
• Coconut milk 🥥
• Thai eggplant 🍆

🔥 Spice meter: 🌶️🌶️🌶️/5
💰 Price: 80-150 THB

caption.default: 🥗 Som Tam (Green Papaya Salad) - Thailand's favorite salad! Shredded green papaya pounded with chilies, garlic, tomatoes, and peanuts. The perfect balance of spicy, sour, sweet, and salty! 🌶️
caption.facebook:
🥗 SOM TAM - Thailand's Addictive Salad! 🥄

This Isaan favorite is made fresh to order:
• Shredded green papaya
• Bird's eye chilies (watch out!)
• Garlic, tomatoes & long beans
• Fish sauce, lime & palm sugar
• Topped with roasted peanuts

⚠️ Warning: Seriously addictive!
🌶️ Ask for 'mai pet' if you can't handle spice!

📍 Found everywhere from street stalls to restaurants!
caption.instagram:
🥗 SOM TAM - Spicy Papaya Power! 💥

Thailand's most popular salad! 🇹🇭

🌶️ Spice level: 🔥🔥🔥🔥
💚 Fresh, crunchy, addictive!

💡 Order guide:
• Som Tam Thai - with peanuts
• Som Tam Poo - with crab
• Som Tam Lao - extra funky!

⚡ Street price: 40-60 THB
